translate.name: checkout
translate.field_manual_approval_all: Require Manual Approval of all new Purchases?
translate.field_manual_approval_recur: Require Manual Approval af all Automatically Generated Invoices for Recurring Services?
translate.field_manual_approval_amount: Manual Approval Required for any new Purchase Greater Than
translate.field_default_when_amount: Default Checkout Option for Amounts Greater Than
translate.field_required_groups: Require one of the following groups to access this checkout option
translate.field_excluded_products: Excluded orders that include any of the following products from accessing this checkout option
translate.invalid_discount: The discount code was entered incorrectly or is not valid.
translate.redirect_html: If you are not redirected shortly, please click here to redirect.
translate.redirect: Thank you! We will now finalize your purchase and forward you to the secure payment area.
translate.redirect_cancel: Please select your preferred payment option above when you are ready to continue.
translate.bad_checkout_option: This checkout option is currently disabled, please select another.
translate.currency_not_supported: Sorry, the selected payment processor does not support the currency you have selected. Please change your currency to %%currency%%, or try another payment option.
translate.prorated_not_supported: Sorry, this payment processor can not handle pro-rated subscriptions - please select another payment option.
translate.avs_no_match: No match on street or zip
translate.avs_na: AVS not applicable to this transaction
translate.avs_retry: Retry - system unavailable or timed out
translate.avs_fullzip_only: 9 digit zip matches, address does not
translate.avs_partzip_only: 5 digit zip match, no street match
translate.enter_card: Please enter your billing details below
translate.enter_card_onfile: Please select a billing record on file to use
translate.ccv_visa_mc_full: For your safety and security, we require that you enter your card's verification number. The verification number is a 3-digit number printed on the back of your card. It appears after and to the right of your card number
translate.ccv_amex_full: For your safety and security, we require that you enter your card's verification number. The American Express verification number is a small 4-digit number printed on the front of your card on the right hand side.
translate.manual_alert: Thank you, your billing details have been stored for manual review and verification of funds. Once we have reviewed and successfully debited the account provided, we will update the invoice status. In the meanwhile, your invoice will be continue to be displayed as due, you can ignore this unless we contact you stating otherwise.
translate.remit_alert: Thank you, invoice billing status will be displayed as due until reciept and verification of your funds. In the meanwhile, your invoice will be continue to be displayed as due, you can ignore this unless we contact you stating otherwise.
translate.card_invalid: The credit card details entered are invalid!
translate.card_exp_invalid: The expiration details entered are invalid!
